g.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"

text.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"
text.tspan: For anyone who has (or can afford) a VR headset,
Beat Saber is an easy to learn, hard to master
experience that is super easy to get hooked into. The
premise is simple; hit colored blocks in a certain direction
to the beat, but it gets incredibly challenging and addicting
the further you go. This game's difficulty ranges from
incredibly easy to mind-numbingly hard, which makes
Beat Saber pretty hard to outgrow.
